articles.description: Teenager Luke Littler thrashes Stephen Bunting 6-1 with a ruthless display to set up a PDC World Championship final against Michael van Gerwen on Friday.
articles.title: Luke Littler to face Michael van Gerwen in PDC World Darts Championship final

articles.description: Rangers condemn "in the strongest possible terms" an incident in which Celtic's Arne Engels was struck by a coin during Thursday's Old Firm game.
articles.title: Rangers 3-0 Celtic: Ibrox club condemn incident in which Engels hit by coin

articles.description: A huge NFC showdown in Detroit, Lamar Jackson's final MVP audition and a three-way wildcard battle highlight the final weekend of NFL regular-season games.
articles.title: NFL Week 18 preview: Play-off pemutations, MVP watch, Mahomes and Barkley to miss out

articles.description: Thomas Tuchel is set to watch Tottenham's Premier League match at home against Newcastle on Saturday - the German's first game since starting his role as England head coach.
articles.title: Thomas Tuchel: England head coach to watch Tottenham v Newcastle on Saturday

articles.description: Find out the in depth batting and bowling figures for Australia v India in the Men's International Test Match Series on BBC Sport.
articles.title: Australia v India - Cricket - BBC Sport

articles.description: The world's oldest living Olympic gold medallist Agnes Keleti dies at the age of 103.
articles.title: Agnes Keleti: Oldest Olympic gold medallist dies at 103

articles.description: As Trent Alexander-Arnold's Liverpool future remains uncertain amid reports of Real Madrid interest, BBC Sport take a closer look at the situation.
articles.title: Trent Alexander-Arnold: Should Liverpool right-back join Real Madrid?

articles.description: Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti responds to the rumours that the club will make a bid for Liverpool's Trent Alexander-Arnold in the January transfer window.
articles.title: Trent Alexander-Arnold: Carlo Ancelotti responds to Real Madrid bid rumours

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound commentary and follow live text and score updates, plus match report from Dundee v Dundee United in the Scottish Premiership.
articles.title: Dundee vs Dundee United: Scottish Premiership live coverage, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: French skier Cyprien Sarrazin leaves intensive care after successful surgery to drain a bleed on his brain following a fall in training.
articles.title: Cyprien Sarrazin: Skier leaves intensive care after horror crash
